channel.title: kauerfest-2023 on Scott French

item.title: Kauerfest 2023
item.description: I had a fun day down at Kauer Guitars' Kauerfest 2023 on the 16th. I met some cool people and there were many nice guitars. Above all it's always very interesting to get a look inside someone's production and see how they do things. It's been really cool watching Kauer grow and gain a large following. I could see many people there were very invested in Doug's instruments and community which was very impressive and inspiring.
